SELECT
FROM dk_contract_schedule a LEFT JOIN dk_contract c ON a.contract_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON c.install_by = s.id WHERE a.contract_id = #{0} order by a.create_date desc limit #{1},#{2}
